title: Crystal Springs Acupuncture
description: Michael Volk, L.Ac practices acupuncture at Crystal Springs Acupuncture in San Mateo, CA. Specialties include treatment of pain and injury, and cancer support.
cleaned_text: Crystal Springs Acupuncture is still closed for in person appointments. We will announce our reopening time and place soon! If you need to contact me for any reason, please call (650) 539-9040, or write to CSA- Michael Volk, L.Ac 230
